ceo_buyer.justification: Belararoxâ€™s Managing Director, Arvind Misra, commented:...

interest_acquired_percent.justification: ...it has executed a binding agreement to acquire 100% of KCB Resources Pty Ltd (KCB Resources)...

currency.justification: BRX has agreed to an Annual Expenditure Commitment of A$1 million per annum... (A$ implies Australian Dollars).

cash_payments_raw.justification: The consideration is specified as shares and a royalty; no cash payment is mentioned in the deal terms in Appendix A.

share_payments_raw.justification: Not applicable as the number of shares is provided, making the payment calculable (Priority 2), but no issue price is given.

cash_and_share_payments_combined_raw.justification: Not applicable as share consideration is specified by number, not a combined value.

amount_of_shares_issued.justification: Sum of all tranches from Appendix A: '3 million Shares issued on execution... 3 million Shares... on the first anniversary... a further 3 million Shares...'

issued_share_price.justification: The text specifies the number of shares to be issued but does not state a deemed issue price for the transaction.

exploration_commitment_meters.justification: No specific drilling meterage is defined as a contractual commitment; the commitment is monetary.

exploration_commitment_value_raw.justification: BRX has agreed to an Annual Expenditure Commitment of A$1 million per annum for two years...

exploration_commitment_desc.value: Annual Expenditure Commitment of A$1 million per annum for two years, with 60% on direct exploration.
exploration_commitment_desc.justification: BRX has agreed to an Annual Expenditure Commitment of A$1 million per annum for two years, of which 60% will be spent on direct exploration of the Licenses.

nsr_acquired_percent.justification: BRX has agreed to grant the Sellers a 1% net smelter royalty (NSR)...

coverage_area_raw.justification: ...acquire rights to 4,286km2 of prospective tenure across 14 prospecting licenses...

resource_size_desc.justification: The text explicitly states: 'No previous or historical Mineral Resources or Ore Reserves exist for the areas underlain by the KCP.'

buyer_ticker_and_exchange.justification: Belararox Ltd (ASX: BRX) (Belararox or the Company) is pleased to announce...
